documentation.title: File Comment
documentation.standard: A file containing a (named) namespace declaration does not need a file docblock.

code.title: Valid: Start of a namespaced file without a file docblock.
Invalid: Start of a namespaced file with a file docblock.

code_comparison.code: /** * File comment. */ namespace Yoast\A\B; /** * Class docblock. */ class { ...

documentation.standard: A non-namespaced file must have a file docblock.

code.title: Valid: Start of a non-namespaced file with a file docblock.
Invalid: Start of a non-namespaced file missing a file docblock.

documentation.standard: A file comment should be a docblock.

code.title: Invalid: File comment is not a docblock.

documentation.standard: There must be no blank lines before the file comment.

code.title: Valid: No blank line between the PHP open tag and the file comment.
Invalid: Blank line(s) between the PHP open tag and the file comment.

documentation.standard: There must be exactly one blank line after the file comment.

code.title: Valid: One blank line after file comment.
Invalid: No blank line or more than one blank line after file comment.

documentation.standard: A file comment must contain a @package tag.

code.title: Valid: File comment containing the @package tag.
Invalid: File comment missing the @package tag.

documentation.standard: A file comment @package tag must have a package name.

code.title: Valid: File comment @package tag with a package name.
Invalid: File comment @package tag without a package name.
